<title level="1" right="Rules">[All Creatures](/Rules.aspx?ID=1389)</title>

**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 116 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
This entry applies to all creatures that have the theme template applied, regardless of level. For example, if a template states to add the [lawful](/Traits.aspx?ID=99) trait and remove the [chaotic](/Traits.aspx?ID=25) trait, that would alter a creature's alignment from chaotic evil to lawful evil.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
